comment.author: 14171139@N08
comment._content: Is the photographer the same Frank Hurley who was on the famous Antarctic voyage with Shackelton?

comment.author: 30115723@N02
comment._content: Hi Van Felt Yes, it is the same Frank Hurley: you can read about him on our website. You can see more of his images at the National Library of Australia. Liz (admin for the Australian War Memorial)
